title: Brown v. Board of Education National Historic Site: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park       You can help Brown v. Board of Education National Historic Site by becoming a volunteer at the site. You can learn more about the Brown v. Board of Education case by purchasing books from the Western National Parks Association bookstore.  Â        Latin jazz musicians share their music with students at the Latin Jazz Workshop in September 2006. NPS\Cheryl DeShazer  Donations Your donation helps Brown v. Board of Education National Historic Site provide interpretive and educational programs for future visitors. If you would like to make a donation, there is a donation box located in the visitor center or you may send a personal check, money order, or cashier's check made payable to: Brown v. Board of Education NHS 1515 SE Monroe Street Topeka, Kansas 66612
